ld2450_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2450 Sensor component.

*See also: [ld2450 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id2)*

target_count.docs:
**int**: Total targets detected, whether they are stationary or in motion. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2450 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id2)*

still_target_count.docs:
**int**: Count of stationary targets. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2450 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id2)*

moving_target_count.docs:
**int**: Count of moving targets. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2450 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id2)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this [LD2450 Sensor component.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) to use. Required if you have multiple UARTs configured.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#configuration-variables)*

ld2450_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2450 Sensor component.

*See also: [ld2450 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id1)*

has_target.docs:
True if either target is still or in movement. All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).

*See also: [ld2450 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id1)*

has_moving_target.docs:
True if a moving target is detected. All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).

*See also: [ld2450 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id1)*

has_still_target.docs:
True if a still target is detected. All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).

*See also: [ld2450 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id1)*

ld2450_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2450 Sensor component.

*See also: [ld2450 Button](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id5)*

factory_reset.docs:
Resets the `ld2450` to its factory default configuration/values. All options from [Button](https://esphome.io/components/button/index.html#config-button).

*See also: [ld2450 Button](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id5)*

restart.docs:
Restart the `ld2450` device. All options from [Button](https://esphome.io/components/button/index.html#config-button).

*See also: [ld2450 Button](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id5)*

ld2450_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2450 Sensor component.

*See also: [ld2450 Number](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id4)*

presence_timeout.docs:
**int**: The duration, in seconds, for which the [presence states](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#ld2450-binary-sensors) will persist even after the detection is cleared. Default is `5` seconds. All options from [Number](https://esphome.io/components/number/index.html#config-number).

*See also: [ld2450 Number](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id4)*

ld2450_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2450 Sensor component.

*See also: [ld2450 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#ld2450-light-function)*

baud_rate.docs:
Control the UART serial port baud rate. Defaults to `256000`. Once changed, all sensors will stop working until a fresh install with an updated [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) configuration. All options from [Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#config-select).

*See also: [ld2450 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#ld2450-light-function)*

zone_type.docs:
Control the zone detection modes. It can be set to `Disabled`, `Detection` or `Filter`. Selecting the `Disabled` option will disable zone area detection. `Detection` mode is used to detect only targets in the specified area, while `Filter` mode can be used to exclude an area from detection. All options from [Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#config-select).

*See also: [ld2450 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#ld2450-light-function)*

ld2450_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2450 Sensor component if you are using multiple components.

*See also: [ld2450 Switch](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#ld2450-engineering-mode)*

bluetooth.docs:
Turn on/off the bluetooth adapter. Defaults to `true`. All options from [Switch](https://esphome.io/components/switch/index.html#config-switch).

*See also: [ld2450 Switch](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#ld2450-engineering-mode)*

multi_target.docs:
Turn on/off the Multi Target Tracking option. The initial state set based on the corresponding setting as read from LD2450 module at boot. All options from [Switch](https://esphome.io/components/switch/index.html#config-switch).

*See also: [ld2450 Switch](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#ld2450-engineering-mode)*

ld2450_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2450 Sensor component.

*See also: [ld2450 Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id6)*

version.docs:
The `ld2450` firmware version. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).

*See also: [ld2450 Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id6)*

mac_address.docs:
The `ld2450` Bluetooth MAC address. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).

*See also: [ld2450 Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#id6)*
